item.title: Jeff add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jeff add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Søren Kierkegaard
item.description: "People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use." -- Søren Kierkegaard

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Gerald R. Ford
item.description: "A government big enough to give you everything you want is a government big enough to take from you everything you have." -- Gerald R. Ford

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "When trouble arises and things look bad, there is always one individual who perceives a solution and is willing to take command. Very often, that individual is crazy. " -- Dave Barry

item.title: Jeff add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Ellen DeGeneres
item.description: "My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the heck she is." -- Ellen DeGeneres

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Alice Roosevelt Longworth
item.description: "If you haven't got anything nice to say about anybody come sit next to me." -- Alice Roosevelt Longworth
